alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Robeson, northwestern Dillon and northeastern Marlboro Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Minturn, or 9 miles northwest of Dillon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mccoll, Clio, Raemon, Little Rock, Minturn, Dunbar and Tatum. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 187 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
